description: Microsoft Intune is a cloud-based endpoint management solution. This connector facilitates automated operation related to managed device.
name: microsoft-intune
label: Microsoft Intune

fields.title: Get Access Token
options: On behalf of User - Delegate Permission
fields.name: auth_type
fields.description: Select the method using which you will get authentication tokens used to access the security graph APIs. You can choose between On behalf of User – Delegate Permission or Without a User - Application Permission.

Without a User - Application Permission.title: Server URL
Without a User - Application Permission.name: resource
Without a User - Application Permission.description: The service-based URI to which you will connect and perform the automated operations.

Without a User - Application Permission.title: Tenant ID
Without a User - Application Permission.name: tenant_id
Without a User - Application Permission.description: ID of the tenant that you have been provided for your Azure Active Directory instance.

Without a User - Application Permission.title: Client ID
Without a User - Application Permission.name: client_id
Without a User - Application Permission.description: Unique Application ID of the Azure Active Directory application that is used to create an authentication token required to access the API.

Without a User - Application Permission.title: Client Secret
Without a User - Application Permission.name: client_secret
Without a User - Application Permission.description: Unique Client Secret of the Azure Active Directory application that is used to create an authentication token required to access the API. For information on how to get the secret key, see 'https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/windows/security/threat-protection/microsoft-defender-atp/exposed-apis-create-app-webapp'.

On behalf of User - Delegate Permission.title: Server URL
On behalf of User - Delegate Permission.name: resource
On behalf of User - Delegate Permission.description: The service-based URI to which you will connect and perform the automated operations.

On behalf of User - Delegate Permission.title: Tenant ID
On behalf of User - Delegate Permission.name: tenant_id
On behalf of User - Delegate Permission.description: ID of the tenant that you have been provided for your Azure Active Directory instance.

On behalf of User - Delegate Permission.title: Client ID
On behalf of User - Delegate Permission.name: client_id
On behalf of User - Delegate Permission.description: Unique API ID of the Azure Active Directory application that is used to create an authentication token required to access the API.

On behalf of User - Delegate Permission.title: Client Secret
On behalf of User - Delegate Permission.name: client_secret
On behalf of User - Delegate Permission.description: Unique API Secret of the Azure Active Directory application that is used to create an authentication token required to access the API. For information on how to get the secret key, see 'https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/windows/security/threat-protection/microsoft-defender-atp/exposed-apis-create-app-webapp'.

On behalf of User - Delegate Permission.title: Authorization Code
On behalf of User - Delegate Permission.name: code
On behalf of User - Delegate Permission.tooltip: Authorization code that you acquired in the authorization step.
On behalf of User - Delegate Permission.description: (Only Applicable to On behalf of User – Delegate Permission) The authorization code that you acquired during the authorization step. For more information, see the Getting Access Tokens using the Delegate Permissions method section.

On behalf of User - Delegate Permission.title: Redirect URL
On behalf of User - Delegate Permission.description: The redirect_uri of your app, where authentication responses can be sent and received by your app. It must exactly match one of the redirect_uri's you registered in the app registration portal.
On behalf of User - Delegate Permission.name: redirect_url
On behalf of User - Delegate Permission.tooltip: (Only Applicable to On behalf of User – Delegate Permission) The redirect_uri of your app, where authentication responses can be sent and received by your app. The redirect URL that you specify here must exactly match one of the redirect_uri's you have registered in your app registration portal.

fields.title: Verify SSL
fields.name: verify_ssl
fields.description: Specifies whether the SSL certificate for the server is to be verified or not. By default, this option is set as True.

operations.title: Get Managed Devices List
operations.description: Retrieves the list of managed devices from Microsoft Intune.

operations.title: Get Managed Device Details
operations.description: Retrieves a specific managed device from Microsoft Intune based on the managed device ID that you have specified.

parameters.title: Managed Device ID
parameters.description: Specify the ID of the managed device to retrieve its details from Microsoft Intune.
parameters.name: managedDeviceId

operations.title: Retire Device
operations.description: Retire a specific device in Microsoft Intune based on the managed device ID that you have specified.

parameters.title: Managed Device ID
parameters.description: Specify the ID of the managed device to retire in Microsoft Intune.
parameters.name: managedDeviceId

operations.title: Wipe Device
operations.description: Wipe a specific device in Microsoft Intune based on the managed device ID that you have specified.

parameters.title: Managed Device ID
parameters.description: Specify the ID of the managed device to wipe in Microsoft Intune.
parameters.name: managedDeviceId

operations.title: Reset Passcode Device
operations.description: Reset passcode for a specific device in Microsoft Intune based on the managed device ID that you have specified.

parameters.title: Managed Device ID
parameters.description: Specify the ID of the managed device to reset passcode in Microsoft Intune
parameters.name: managedDeviceId

operations.title: Remote Lock Device
operations.description: Remote Lock for a specific device in Microsoft Intune based on the managed device ID that you have specified.

parameters.title: Managed Device ID
parameters.description: Specify the ID of the managed device to remote lock in Microsoft Intune.
parameters.name: managedDeviceId

operations.title: Request Remote Assistance for Device
operations.description: Request a remote assistance for a specific device in Microsoft Intune based on the managed device ID that you have specified.

parameters.title: Managed Device ID
parameters.description: Specify the ID of the managed device to request a remote assistance in Microsoft Intune.
parameters.name: managedDeviceId

operations.title: Disable Lost Mode for Device
operations.description: Disable a lost mode for a specific device in Microsoft Intune based on the managed device ID that you have specified.

parameters.title: Managed Device ID
parameters.description: Specify the ID of the managed device to disable a lost mode in Microsoft Intune.
parameters.name: managedDeviceId

operations.title: Locate a Device
operations.description: Locate a specific device in Microsoft Intune based on the managed device ID that you have specified.

parameters.title: Managed Device ID
parameters.description: Specify the ID of the managed device to locate in Microsoft Intune.
parameters.name: managedDeviceId

operations.title: Bypass Activation Lock for Device
operations.description: Bypass activation lock for a specific device in Microsoft Intune based on the managed device ID that you have specified.

parameters.title: Managed Device ID
parameters.description: Specify the ID of the managed device to bypass activation lock in Microsoft Intune.
parameters.name: managedDeviceId

operations.title: Reboot Device
operations.description: Reboot a specific device in Microsoft Intune based on the managed device ID that you have specified.

parameters.title: Managed Device ID
parameters.description: Specify the ID of the managed device to reboot in Microsoft Intune.
parameters.name: managedDeviceId

operations.title: Shutdown Device
operations.description: Shutdown a specific device in Microsoft Intune based on the managed device ID that you have specified.

parameters.title: Managed Device ID
parameters.description: Specify the ID of the managed device to shutdown in Microsoft Intune.
parameters.name: managedDeviceId

operations.title: Recover Passcode for Device
operations.description: Recover passcode for a specific device in Microsoft Intune based on the managed device ID that you have specified.

parameters.title: Managed Device ID
parameters.description: Specify the ID of the managed device to recover passcode in Microsoft Intune.
parameters.name: managedDeviceId

operations.title: Clean Windows Device
operations.description: Clean windows of a specific device in Microsoft Intune based on the managed device ID that you have specified.

parameters.title: Managed Device ID
parameters.description: Specify the ID of the managed device to clean windows in Microsoft Intune.
parameters.name: managedDeviceId

operations.title: Logout Apple Device for Active User
operations.description: Logout shared apple device for a active user in Microsoft Intune based on the managed device ID that you have specified.

parameters.title: Managed Device ID
parameters.description: Specify the ID of the managed device to logout apple device for a active user in Microsoft Intune.
parameters.name: managedDeviceId

operations.title: Delete User from Apple Device
operations.description: Deletes an user from shared apple device in Microsoft Intune based on the managed device ID that you have specified.

parameters.title: Managed Device ID
parameters.description: Specify the ID of the managed device which you delete user from apple device in Microsoft Intune.
parameters.name: managedDeviceId

operations.title: Sync Device
operations.description: Sync for a specific device in Microsoft Intune based on the managed device ID that you have specified.

parameters.title: Managed Device ID
parameters.description: Specify the ID of the managed device which you want to sync in Microsoft Intune.
parameters.name: managedDeviceId

operations.title: Windows Defender Scan
operations.description: Scan a windows defender device in Microsoft Intune based on the managed device ID that you have specified.

parameters.title: Managed Device ID
parameters.description: Specify the ID of the managed device which you want to scan in Microsoft Intune.
parameters.name: managedDeviceId

operations.title: Update Signature for Windows Defender
operations.description: Updates a signature for windows defender in Microsoft Intune based on the managed device ID that you have specified.

parameters.title: Managed Device ID
parameters.description: Specify the ID of the managed device which you want to update a signature for windows defender in Microsoft Intune.
parameters.name: managedDeviceId

operations.title: Update Account for Windows Device
operations.description: Updates a account for windows device in Microsoft Intune based on the managed device ID that you have specified.

parameters.title: Managed Device ID
parameters.description: Specify the ID of the managed device which you want to update a account for windows device in Microsoft Intune.
parameters.name: managedDeviceId
